message: I'm excited to offer you the product for a price of $15000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $8000. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious investment, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand you're on a budget, but I'm afraid $9000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we discuss a price of $12500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the previous offer, so how about we discuss a price of $11250?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm afraid $11250 is still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $13000?

I understand you're trying to get closer to your target, but I'm afraid I've reached my maximum budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the previous offer, so how about we discuss a price of $11500?
